headline: Here’s Why Platinum International Technology Fund Increased Its Stake in Intuitive Surgical (ISRG)
summary: Platinum Asset Management, an investment management company, released its Q3 2025 investor letter for “Platinum International Technology Fund”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund was up 6% in the third quarter, driven by strong performance from AI-oriented holdings. The portfolio holds around 30% of its stake in AI infrastructure stocks […]
